options.text: Genetic makeup of the egg determines the sex of the child in human.
Genetic makeup of the sperm determines the sex of the child in human.
XO and XY type of sex determination is an example of female heterogamety.
ZZ and ZW type of sex determination is an example of male heterogamety.

solution.text: Human shows XY mechanism of sex determination in which female carries autosome and XX chromosome, thus are homogametic. Males carries autosome and XY chromosome, thus heterogametc. Sex of the progeny is determined by gametes of heterogametic parents. XO and XY type of sex determination is an example of male heterogamety. Henking observed X body in spermatogenesis of Grasshopper.
